column1: MENU - in focus means 30vh from the top of the viewport. The item is positioned sticky in webflow with this to of 30vh too so they line up.

column6: Progress Bar Length(rem) when current menu has the .active class added to it.
column7: Content that should be in focus(or come into focus) when current element is clicked
column8: Menu item(menu index number) that should recieve the .active class when the current menu item is focused

column1: CONTENT - section info of content that rolls into place when the relative menu is clicked.
